distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for ghostscript fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-29508: Fixed heap pointer leak in pdf_base_font_alloc (bsc#1227380)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: Artifex Ghostscript before 10.03.0 has a heap-based pointer disclosure (observable in a constructed BaseFont name) in the function pdf_base_font_alloc.
notes.title: CVE description
